Argentina: San Ignacio school in Córdoba founded by Jesuits
Brazil: Treaty of The Hague: The Dutch Republic recognizes Portuguese imperial sovereignty over New Holland (Dutch Brazil).
China: The Shunzhi Emperor died. He was succeeded by his young son the Kangxi Emperor, with the Four Regents of the Kangxi Emperor acting as regents.
The Southern Ming admiral Koxinga declared the establishment of the Kingdom of Tungning on Taiwan.
India: Guru Har Krishan becomes eight guru of Sikhs.
Russia: The Treaty of Valiesar expired. Muscovy returned Ingria to the Swedish Empire by the Treaty of Cardis.
Taiwan: Zheng Chenggong departs from Jinmen Island for Taiwan

Zheng Chenggong arrives on the shores of Dutch Formosa near Fort Provintia where three Dutch ships attack them, but one sinks, and the other two retreat; two subsequent Dutch attacks are also defeated
Fort Provintia surrenders to Zheng Chenggong
Aboriginals around the Bay of Tayouan surrender to Zheng Chenggong
Fort Zeelandia launches an attack on Zheng Chengong's army and is defeated
